summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), light levels (up 4160 lux), cloud levels (up 536 m), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1467 m), light levels (up 6472 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 536.0m lower than yesterday, 1041.6m lower than past week, 1466.8m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1337.3m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels. Showers, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
